Description: Lend Lease (US) Construction LMB Inc. (formerly Bovis Lend Lease LMB Inc.) entered into a deferred prosecution agreement to resolve charges of conspiring to commit mail and wire fraud by fraudulently overbilling its clients for over a decade.
Agency: U.S. Attorney-Eastern District of New York

Private Litigation Case Title: Sewell et al v. Bovis Lend Lease, Inc. et al

Description: Bovis agreed to pay $5 million to New York City to resolve allegations about overcharges on construction projects.
Info Source: Contractor and City Settle Overcharges for $5 Million, New York Times, January 6, 2011 (via Nexis).

Agency: District of Columbia Department of Energy & Environment
Info Source: Contained in data received from the agency on January 13, 2021 in response to an open records request.

Notes: Penalty listed includes a $2,200 Supplemental Environmental Project.

NAICS Translation: 236116: New Multifamily Housing Construction (except Operative Builders)
